website_summaries.verdict: A nice, colorful set that's suitable for youngsters who like toys that challenge their imaginations to create their own fashionable looks.
pros: Earns praise from kids who like fashion, as the interchangeable parts include hairdos, hats, and wings
Has 4 cute characters with eye-catching colors
cons: Some characters have  components such as arms that don't attach securely

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old approved!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pack for my 5 year old daughter who plays Roblox and she really likes! Just make sure you have a container to keep all the pieces in as they are small and easily lost!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Cute for real imagination
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t expect to love these so much, I got them for my 6 year old because she loves roblox and I thought it would be good for her to use her imagination and play outside of her tablet! They are such nice quality and bigger than I thought they would be. So cool how you can mix them all up.
customer_reviews.author: jessica lynette hall

customer_reviews.title: kinda hard puttig together
customer_reviews.text: Its fun for my daughter and its was it was with a lot of characters. The only thing thats bad of it is that one of the characters head was stuck but everything else was good.It can also be lost very easily .
customer_reviews.author: MisterTenPercent

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves acting out “Roblox” with these little characters. She is seven years old and the toys themselves seem age appropriate and interest appropriate. Read the age rating as the smaller pieces are definitely not suitable for children under three. Great value offering hours of play for the imaginative kid.
customer_reviews.author: V. Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: small pieces, great for older kids
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loves this, she makes little videos of toys in a story line, they come apart and you can switch them up and make different types of roblox characters. there are many little piece so its best not for little kids that like to put things in there mouth. other then that this is a great toy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: jacoches808

customer_reviews.title: awesome set
customer_reviews.text: Wings are mix and match left and right sides if you want, my 8 year old thinks this is one of the most fun sets we've ever seen! :)
customer_reviews.author: Mischief

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday present. It was a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Doyle

customer_reviews.title: A toy she actually plays with
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these toys she plays with them for hours. It's better than her stealing my phone to play Roblox online!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Nino

customer_reviews.title: Kid 💘
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved them and had fun mixing and matching 💕 Also got cool virtual fairy outfit for Roblox account.
customer_reviews.author: CrystallHale

customer_reviews.title: Cute toys..
customer_reviews.text: The code for the free item didn't work, otherwise the item is good.
customer_reviews.author: A5

customer_reviews.title: My niece loved it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my niece, she loved it. It comes with a code that you can redeem online for a virtual item which goes to your child's roblox account. My niece plays on the xbox one and was excited to get new item for her character.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa T.

customer_reviews.title: Cute mix and match
customer_reviews.text: Fun set for pretend play, my kids love mixing the pieces up.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Z

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece for Christmas since she is a Roblox fan, and she loved it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Teague

customer_reviews.title: My kids had fun with them
customer_reviews.text: Pretty neat little set where you can mix and match all the accessories. My daughters liked them.
customer_reviews.author: reece

customer_reviews.title: so cute
customer_reviews.text: this is much cuter in person than in the picture!! the kids loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: venus

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift for my daughter! She loves to mix and match all of the accessories!
customer_reviews.author: Corey Beth

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these. Any Roblox player would like these.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Carr

customer_reviews.title: Good for Roblox fans
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves Roblox, so she has very much enjoyed this figurine set.
customer_reviews.author: T. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Girls love them
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved them and started playing with them right away.
customer_reviews.author: John Lujan

customer_reviews.title: Was worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: These Roblox figures are superrrr cute and are great for my daughter to play with! She loves them.. was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: desirae

customer_reviews.title: Roblox characters
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my granddaughter. They are what they are - fun little toys.
customer_reviews.author: cyn ann

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Walmart was double in price for same item. Great deal
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Price was a little cheaper than the store, my daughter loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Just as I expected! These were great cake toppers for my ROBLOX playing teen. She loves them and has them displayed in her room. Awesome find!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alecia

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and great price. Bought these for my daughters birthday and she loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: My kiddo and his friends have lots of fun with these!
customer_reviews.author: gistside

customer_reviews.title: Terrific gift for kid
customer_reviews.text: 9 year old liked it a lot. Many inter-changing parts. Dolls can be made to move in different positions.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: WRONG TOY
customer_reviews.text: I got this for cristmas but the WRONG TOY came in and i dont know what to do!
customer_reviews.author: Luce

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and yes my grandchild liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Roblox toy set
customer_reviews.text: thank you so much my daughter loved it and it's perfect.....
customer_reviews.author: CHARDONNAE MOORE

customer_reviews.title: Kids liked it but hard to play with
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved them bc they love ROBLOX . But difficult to play with compared to LEGO’s. Difficult to get hair off head. Too pricey for what you get but there is no other option.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: ... am putting these icons on a t-shirt for my great grand daughter
customer_reviews.text: I am putting these icons on a t-shirt for my great grand daughter
customer_reviews.author: Rita M Bellinghausen

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The heads fall off and you cannot position the arms because they pop off too and don't stay on as well. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jodi L.

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a cute gift! Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my daughter and it’s a deal for the amount of items in the box! It looks just the image on post and arrived on time to gift to my daughter. At stores it’s double the price or even more for same thing so I recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

product_meta.title: Roblox Celebrity Collection - Fashion Icons Four Figure Pack [Includes Exclusive Virtual Item]
product_meta.description: Ever dream of starring in your own fashion show? Create your own stylish Robloxians in the palm of your hand with this fabulous collection of parts and accessories! Mix-and-match gorgeous hairstyles and colorful wings to build a unique character. Then, add other chic accessories from your entire Roblox collection to design even more fun characters. Become the ultimate Roblox fashionista! Includes: 4 Figures, Acessories, Collector's Checklist, and an Exclusive Virtual Code.
feature_bullets: The Roblox Fashion Icons Mix & Match Set includes four figures with interchangeable parts and loads of accessories compatible with other characters in your collection
Mix and match parts to build your own unique Roblox character
Deck out your figures with the included accessories
Each package comes with a redeemable code to unlock an exclusive virtual item on Roblox
Collect all your favorite Roblox figures today

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars355 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
